test_cases.title: Secure checkout for payment information protection
steps: I click on the login button.
test_cases.expected_result: The checkout process is completed successfully. My payment information is protected.

test_cases.title: Edge case: Empty payment method selection
steps: I select an empty payment method.
I try to complete the checkout process.
test_cases.expected_result: The checkout process fails due to insufficient payment information. Please provide valid payment details.

test_cases.title: Error scenario: Invalid input validation
steps: I enter an invalid login credential.
I click on the login button.
test_cases.expected_result: The checkout process fails due to insufficient validation. Please try again with valid credentials.

test_cases.title: Error scenario: Network connection issue
steps: I experience a network connection failure during the checkout process.
I try to complete the checkout again.
test_cases.expected_result: The checkout process fails due to network connectivity issues. Please reconnect and retry.

test_cases.title: Positive scenario: Successful payment confirmation
test_cases.expected_result: The checkout process is completed successfully. My payment information is protected.

test_cases.title: Positive scenario: Multiple payment methods available
test_cases.expected_result: The checkout process is completed successfully. My payment information is protected.
